channel.title: Fixing lag, will rep for a solution that helps
channel.description: on my server the lag is horrible for example when you click somewhere to walk you walk a square, stop, walk a square, stop all the way until you get to where u clicked so is there any way to fix this? also im using dragon history base.

item.title: Fixing lag, will rep for a solution that helps
item.dc:creator: @frozon566 frozon566
item.description:
@frozon566 wrote:

well im not the hoster, so is it my internet or my hosters?
